entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 25 except 21 near Lake Huron.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 25 except 21 near Lake Huron. Humidex 26. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
